reference.title: ListSchedules
reference.shortdesc: You can use ListSchedules to get information about all scheduled snapshots that have been created.

section.title: Parameters
section.p: This method has no input parameters.

section.title: Return value
section.p: This method has the following return value:

row.entry: A list of the schedules currently on the cluster.

section.title: Response example
section.p: This method returns a response similar to the following example:
